fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a player. You will defend them from any sentences, meaning that they can't receive night feedback and they won't hear whispers.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Only one player can be affected by your ability at a time. If you select a different player while having selected another player previously, the effect wears off of the previous player.
- The effects of your ability will occur even if you are dead.
